Goal Representation: ['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, sink)
        # Place the shirt inside the sink

        achieve is_on(sink)
        # Turn on the faucet for washing

        wash(shirt) 
        # Main action to wash the shirt
        
        scrub(shirt)
        # Scrub the shirt to remove dirt

        rinse(shirt)
        # Rinse the shirt with water

        achieve is_off(sink)
        # Turn off the faucet after use

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select a shirt that needs to be washed

        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink for the washing process

        wash_shirt(shirt, sink)
        # Execute the washing behavior for the selected shirt
